title: Administer a Commercial Lease
description: A new tenant has signed a lease for a retail space. The property manager must set them up in the system.

tasks.description: Abstract the key terms from the fully executed lease agreement (e.g., rent amount, start/end dates, CAM charges, renewal options).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately extracts all critical data points from the lease.

tasks.description: Set up the new tenant and their lease terms in the property management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly enters all abstracted lease data into the system.

tasks.description: Schedule future rent escalations and renewal option deadlines in the system calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up automated reminders for important future dates.
